description.narrative: By 2015, at least 50% of communities in targeted districts have the required supplies and skills to improve household water quality, which contributes to Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2015, the most vulnerable girls and boys have sustainable and equitable access to and use quality, targeted basic social services, particularly to accelerate progress toward MDGs 1, 2, 3, 4

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
